    • Uses of Context in sorcer.core

      Subinterfaces of Context in sorcer.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  InclusiveContext
      The InclusiveContext is an interface designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context ContextManagement.getContext()
      Returns the default dataContext by the defining provider.

      Obtains the dataContext from data storage used to hold the contexts.

      Classes in sorcer.core.context that implement Context 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayContext
      The Array dataContext has an array like access to a service dataContext.
      class  ComprehensiveContext
      The Comprehensive Context is a data structure designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request.
      class  ControlContext 
      class  ListContext<T>
      ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
      class  PositionalContext<T> 
      class  ServiceContext<T>
      Implements the base-level service context interface Context.
      class  SharedAssociativeContext
      SpaceContext persists its dataContext nodes in a distributed array in JavaSpace with the name provided in the constructor.
      class  SharedIndexedContext<T>
      ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
